QueryDefinition.Query:
with a as ( SELECT ch.person_id as PersonId, note_date, null as result_numeric, result_narrative, system_name || ' grade tubular ' || grade_tubular as source1, system_name || ' grade nuclear ' || grade_nuclear as source2, system_name || ' grade mitotic ' || grade_mitotic as source3, null as source4, null as neoplasm_histology_key FROM {sc}.onc_evaluation_system l JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND l.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where temporal_status = 'current' and system_name like 'Nottingham%'
union
SELECT ch.person_id as PersonId, note_date, null as result_numeric, result_narrative, system_name || ' grade primary ' || grade_primary as source1, system_name || ' grade secondary ' || grade_secondary as source2, system_name || ' grade tertiary ' || grade_tertiary as source3, system_name || ' result numeric ' || result_numeric as source4, null as neoplasm_histology_key FROM {sc}.onc_evaluation_system l JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND l.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where temporal_status = 'current' and system_name like 'Gleason%'
union
SELECT ch.person_id as PersonId, note_date, result_numeric, result_narrative, system_name || ' ' || result_numeric as source1, null as source2, null as source3, null as source4, null as neoplasm_histology_key FROM {sc}.onc_evaluation_system l JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND l.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where temporal_status = 'current' and result_numeric is not null and lower(system_name) in ('figo grade', 'durie/salmon stage', 'international staging system stage', 'riss stage', 'rai stage', 'figo stage', 'binet stage')
union
SELECT ch.person_id as PersonId, note_date, result_numeric, result_narrative, system_name as source1, null as source2, null as source3, null as source4, null as neoplasm_histology_key FROM {sc}.onc_evaluation_system l JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND l.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where temporal_status = 'current' and result_numeric is not null and lower(system_name) in ('ecog performance status', 'karnofsky performance status', 'oncotype dx recurrence score', 'recurrence score') )
select distinct *, 1147127 as meas_event_field_concept_id, null as unit from a
order by 1
